choices: Or I become Dante ( From devil may cry)
1.content:
As i was walking home from school the one day i found a strange object on the ground. It was the triforce. I was Dumbstruck. So as i got in the house i just rembered that my parents had gone on a trip for a few months.l So i made my self supper and i headed up to my bedroom to play Legend of zelda Orcrina of time.
I played the game til i got up to the part where you reque princess ruto. By the time i got up to the part it was very late so i turned the game off got ready for bed and so on and so forth. As i was sleeping the Tv screen on for some strange reason and it was glowing white and a Blueshih figure came out ofthe screan and landed on the carpet. It took a quick look around and saw me sleeping in my bed. It craweld in the bed with me and snuggled right by me. It was morinng and i turned over to find a bluish fish girl Sleeping right besided me. I quicky relized that it was Princess ruto but just as i was getting out of bed to slpash some water on my face she awoke and said" Where are you going cutie." Then the next thing that happened was...
1.title: The begging

14.content:
I was freaked out that Princess ruto was in my bed so i blacked out. I started cominng to and just as my eyes were finnshed getting unblurry. i seen that i was in my bed with some bandages on my body. Plus Princess ruto was looking nearlly at tears before i awoke. She said Thank goodness you are awke i thought yo were sersoully hurt. I said why did you help me . Cause you are a very hadsome guy and i do not whant to see you sad or hurt.Uh thanks.
Then she came up to me and she slipped her tonghe into my mouth and i said to my self what the heck. She finshed kissing me and i got out of my bed and heaaded to my bathroom for my shower.
14.title: I faint

info.brief_description: Where i some meet the zelda girls they come to livie with me but they all love me.
info.description:
This story story line is where i am just playing a legend of zelda game but i quit for the night but as i sllep one of them some how get out of the tv Preferbly Ruto) and crawl into bed with me then as time goes on more and more girls come. So come on and add chapetrs Today.
Also i have blond hair. Crest Out!
